option.name: title_text
option.value: Build a canvas app using Copilot

string_table.name: pxabnsnfns10110001101
string_table.string: To watch this video, use the preview feature in Storyline 360, upload your published output to a server, publish to Review 360, or switch to static video quality.
Streaming video is unavailable for local playback.
Use the w, a, s, and d keys to move around the 360 degree image. Press the tab key to jump to interactive markers and hotspots.

slidelink.displaytext: Enhanced app creation with Power Apps
Record the In and Out Time of visitors
Record the In and Out Time of visitors

slidetranscripts.slidetranscript: <Document xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Building a canvas app in Microsoft Power Apps is easy, and with Microsoft Copilot, it's even easier. Explore this interactive simulation to learn how." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="As you know, Power Apps enables you to create apps without coding. Copilot takes this a step further, making the process even more effortless and efficient. You can just describe what you need through multiple steps of conversation and see your app become reality in a few moments. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="In this simulation, youll see how the intelligent app building capabilities of Power Apps are supported by Copilot's intuitive natural language interface to build a new canvas app.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Select the Next button at the bottom right corner of the screen to begin." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Bellows College is an educational organization with multiple buildings on campus. Campus visitors are currently recorded in paper journals. The information is not captured consistently, and there are no means to collect and analyze data about the visits across the entire campus.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="For this simulation, you will step into the role of the Campus Admin Officer for Bellows College.Your objective is to modernize the visitor registration system where access to the buildings is controlled and all visits are recorded and later, analyzed by the hosts.In this simulation, you will use Copilot to create a new canvas app for logging visits." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="This app should be able to record the In and Out time of visitors, categorize the purpose of their visit, and also note the building number visited.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="In this simulation, you will experience multiple prompts for each of the mentioned requirements, highlighting the importance of providing accurate and precise prompts to achieve optimal output.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Select the Next button to learn how to navigate the simulation." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Now, select the Next button to start the simulation." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Lets begin with building the app. In your browser address bar, type: https://make.powerapps.com. Select Autofill to add the text." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Here are two prompts. Lets explore which of these prompts will most effectively help you in creating the app. This exercise will demonstrate how slight variations in prompts can lead to optimal results. Begin by selecting Prompt 1. " /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Plain" Color="#000000" BulletChar="" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Copilot will begin building a table structure for your application. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Plain" BulletChar="" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="On the right-hand side, review the table structure in the Copilot window." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Plain" Color="#222222" BulletChar="" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="The table structure will be updated accordingly. To see the table, select the ellipsis " /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Plain" BulletChar="" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Copilot provides a table structure to support your application, along with sample data. This table is displayed in the lower half of the screen. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Plain" BulletChar="" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="To enlarge the table for better visibility, drag the top border upward." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="The selected prompt generates a table structure that focuses broadly on recording visitor data which is irrelevant and omits crucial details required for logging campus visits. Therefore, the prompt lacks the precision needed for our current requirement. " /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Lets explore the effectiveness of the next prompt. Select Prompt 2. " /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Plain" Color="#000000" BulletChar="" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Copilot will begin building a table structure for your application. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Plain" BulletChar="" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="On the right-hand side, review the table structure in the Copilot window." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="The table structure will be updated accordingly. To see the table, select the ellipsis. " /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="6"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Plain" BulletChar="" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Copilot provides a table structure to support your application, along with sample data. This table is displayed in the lower half of the screen. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="6"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Plain" BulletChar="" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="To enlarge the table for better visibility, drag the top border upward." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="6"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Plain" Color="#1F2328" BulletChar="" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="The generated table structure aligns well with our goal to log visits to the college campus. As you can see, this prompt text is specific, ensuring we capture the necessary data accurately. By selecting the right prompt, you'll ensure your application performs the intended function effectively.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="6"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#636C76" BulletChar="" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Note that when using generative AI, you may not always get the same exact results. It is possible that your table may not exactly match the table created for another user.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="6"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#636C76" BulletChar="" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Now that we have the desired table structure with the optimal prompt for app creation, we'll use Copilot to customize it according to the information you want the app to record.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Your first requirement is to record the In and Out time of visitors.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Plain" Color="#000000" BulletChar="" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> <Span Text="Lets proceed to Prompt 2. Select Prompt 2. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Plain" BulletChar="" BulletFont="Arial"> <BulletPicture Size="0x0" /> </ListStyle> </Style> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="A purpose column has been included within the table. Your second requirement is to categorize the purpose of each visit." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="This prompt provides a good starting point by listing the categories needed. However, it doesn't specify how these categories should be implemented, which may result in a less structured or inconsistent input method." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Now select Prompt 2." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="This prompt is more specific, offering specific instructions to change the Purpose field to a choice menu with predefined options. This ensures consistency in the data collected and makes it easier for users to select the appropriate category, giving you the desired output for Requirement 2." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Now that youve updated the Purpose column, let's proceed to the next requirement. Your third requirement is to note the building number visited by the visitor. " /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Observe the outcome. This prompt suggests adding a Building column but is quite vague about the specifics. Without detailed instructions, the column ends up with varied and inconsistent information, which could cause confusion." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Moving on to the next prompt. Select Prompt 2. " /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Notice the difference in outcome with this prompt. The prompt clearly specifies the need for a Building number column. It provides a precise and straightforward approach, ensuring that each entry is consistent and easily understandable, meeting Requirement 3 effectively." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="You have successfully used Copilot to create a new app!" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Well done!
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="You can use the same steps and use Copilot in Power Apps to create a variety of apps tailored to your specific needs." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>
